channel.title: Comments on: “Gay Baby Buying a Titan 1 Missile Base to Survive the Coming Zombie Apocalypse”

item.title: By: Kevin Langston

item.description:

item.title: By: Sven
item.dc:creator: Sven
item.description: "Fixed Gears are for Jerks and Lesbians" is a great name, amazing band, and no less than a 100% true statement.
item.content:encoded: “Fixed Gears are for Jerks and Lesbians” is a great name, amazing band, and no less than a 100% true statement.

item.title: By: patrick
item.dc:creator: patrick
item.description: robin williams on fire isn't just a band name; it's also a good suggestion to get rid of that pesky robin williams problem the world is having.
item.content:encoded: robin williams on fire isn’t just a band name; it’s also a good suggestion to get rid of that pesky robin williams problem the world is having.
